mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(AVG(t.transaction_amount), 0) FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND t.deposit_withdrawal = 'WITHDRAWAL' AND t.created_time BETWEEN DATE_SUB(#{transactionDate}, INTERVAL 31 DAY) -- 30일 전 AND DATE_SUB(#{transactionDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY); -- 어제
